text: The provisions of this chapter shall not apply to public or court officers, or to any other person or persons acting under the license, direction, or authority of any court, local or federal, selling goods, wares, or merchandise in the course of their official duties.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Chapter not applicable to public officials.
